original_text: The other nations shook when they heard that great tree fall. I had caused it to go down into its grave, deep under the ground, as all people must die. The other strong trees saw what had happened to the great cedar tree. They were the trees of Eden and the best trees of Lebanon that had received plenty of water. They were pleased to see that the great cedar tree had fallen down.
korean_text: 내가 그를 구덩이에 내려가는 자와 함께 스올에 떨어뜨리던 때에 백성들이 그 떨어지는 소리로 말미암아 진동하게 하였고 물을 마시는 에덴의 모든 나무 곧 레바논의 뛰어나고 아름다운 나무들이 지하에서 위로를 받게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: when they heard that great tree fall
sentences.korean_translation: 그 큰 나무가 쓰러지는 소리를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: I had caused it to go down into its grave
The other strong trees saw what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 튼튼한 나무들이 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았으며

sentences.original_text: They were the trees of Eden
and the best trees of Lebanon
that had received plenty of water
that the great cedar tree had fallen down
